name: Street & Alleys
overview: An implementation of the "Streets and alleys" patience, and its variation "Beleaguered castle", where you have eight shuffled stacks of cards surrounding four pads where cards of the same colour must be stacked from the ace and upwards. Cards can be moved between stacks, but only adjacent numbers. The game is multitasking-friendly and has settings for screen colours, hints and can talk to you using voice synthesis.
